findings.rationale: An indefinite term can create ongoing obligations without a clear end, potentially leading to perpetual liability or uncertainty for the Receiving Party.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: Without specific termination conditions, the Receiving Party may be unsure about when their obligations end, leading to potential compliance risks.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
